Imp Catcher.name: Imp Catcher
descriptions: Increases the effect of your Imp's Firebolt, Fire Shield, and Blood Pact spells by 10%, and reduces the casting time of your Imp's Firebolt by 15%.
Increases the effect of your Imp's Firebolt, Fire Shield, and Blood Pact spells by 20%, and reduces the casting time of your Imp's Firebolt by 30%.
Increases the effect of your Imp's Firebolt, Fire Shield, and Blood Pact spells by 30%, and reduces the casting time of your Imp's Firebolt by 50%.

Sacrilege.name: Sacrilege
descriptions: Increases the amount of Health restored by your Healthstone by 10%, and increases the effects of your Demon Skin and Demon Armor spells by 50%.
Increases the amount of Health restored by your Healthstone by 20%, and increases the effects of your Demon Skin and Demon Armor spells by 100%.

Demonic Embrace.name: Demonic Embrace
descriptions: Increases your total Stamina by 3% but reduces your total Spirit by 1%.
Increases your total Stamina by 6% but reduces your total Spirit by 2%.
Increases your total Stamina by 9% but reduces your total Spirit by 3%.
Increases your total Stamina by 12% but reduces your total Spirit by 4%.
Increases your total Stamina by 15% but reduces your total Spirit by 5%.

Into the Void.name: Into the Void
descriptions: Increases the duration of your Voidwalker's Torment, Consume Shadows, Sacrifice and Suffering spells by 33%, and reduces their cost by 25%.
Increases the duration of your Voidwalker's Torment, Consume Shadows, Sacrifice and Suffering spells by 66%, and reduces their cost by 50%.
Increases the duration of your Voidwalker's Torment, Consume Shadows, Sacrifice and Suffering spells by 100%, and reduces their cost by 75%.

Blood Tithe.name: Blood Tithe
descriptions: Increases the amount of Health transferred by your Health Funnel spell by 25%, and causes Health Funnel to transfer mana to your demon equal to 50% of the amount.
Increases the amount of Health transferred by your Health Funnel spell by 50%, and causes Health Funnel to transfer mana to your demon equal to 100% of the amount.

Fel Intellect.name: Fel Intellect
descriptions: Increases the maximum Mana of your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, and Felhunter by 20%.
Increases the maximum Mana of your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, and Felhunter by 40%.
Increases the maximum Mana of your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, and Felhunter by 60%.
Increases the maximum Mana of your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, and Felhunter by 80%.
Increases the maximum Mana of your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, and Felhunter by 100%.

Unholy Mistress.name: Unholy Mistress
descriptions: Increases the effect of your Succubus' spells by 10%, reduces their cooldown by 25%, and decreases their mana cost by 25%.
Increases the effect of your Succubus' spells by 20%, reduces their cooldown by 50%, and decreases their mana cost by 50%.
Increases the effect of your Succubus' spells by 30%, reduces their cooldown by 75%, and decreases their mana cost by 75%.

Master Summoner.name: Master Summoner
descriptions: Reduces the casting time of your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, and Felhunter Summoning spells by 2 sec and the Mana cost by 20%. In addition, your critical strikes with non-periodic Fire spells have a 50% chance to summon a Lesser Imp.

Reduces the casting time of your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, and Felhunter Summoning spells by 4 sec and the Mana cost by 40%. In addition, your critical strikes with non-periodic Fire spells have a 100% chance to summon a Lesser Imp.

Fel Stamina.name: Fel Stamina
descriptions: Increases the maximum Health of your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, and Felhunter by 10%.
Increases the maximum Health of your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, and Felhunter by 20%.
Increases the maximum Health of your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, and Felhunter by 30%.
Increases the maximum Health of your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, and Felhunter by 40%.
Increases the maximum Health of your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, and Felhunter by 50%.

Hellhound.name: Hellhound
descriptions: Reduces the cooldown of your Felhunter's Spell Lock and Devour Magic abilities by 10%.
Reduces the cooldown of your Felhunter's Spell Lock and Devour Magic abilities by 20%.
Reduces the cooldown of your Felhunter's Spell Lock and Devour Magic abilities by 30%.

Fel Domination.name: Fel Domination
descriptions: Your next Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, or Felhunter Summon spell has its casting time reduced by 5.5 sec and its Mana cost reduced by 50%.

Unholy Power.name: Unholy Power
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your Voidwalker, Succubus, and Felhunter's melee attacks by 30%, and reduces the mana cost of your Imp's Firebolt spell by 50%.

Left Hand Path.name: Left Hand Path
descriptions: Increases the amount of damage absorbed by your Spellstone by 25%.
Increases the amount of damage absorbed by your Spellstone by 50%.

Tyrant.name: Tyrant
descriptions: Reduces the Attack Speed and Casting Speed penalty of your Enslave Demon spell by 8%, and increases the duration by 5 minutes.
Reduces the Attack Speed and Casting Speed penalty of your Enslave Demon spell by 16%, and increases the duration by 10 minutes.
Reduces the Attack Speed and Casting Speed penalty of your Enslave Demon spell by 24%, and increases the duration by 15 minutes.
Reduces the Attack Speed and Casting Speed penalty of your Enslave Demon spell by 32%, and increases the duration by 20 minutes.
Reduces the Attack Speed and Casting Speed penalty of your Enslave Demon spell by 40%, and increases the duration by 25 minutes.

Right Hand Path.name: Right Hand Path
descriptions: Increases the critical strike chance, critical strike bonus, and bonus Fire damage from Firestones by 5%.
Increases the critical strike chance, critical strike bonus, and bonus Fire damage from Firestones by 10%.

Master Demonologist.name: Master Demonologist
descriptions:
Grants both the Warlock and the summoned demon an effect as long as that demon is active.

Imp - Reduces threat caused by 4%.

Voidwalker - Reduces physical damage taken by 2%.

Succubus - Increases all damage caused by 2%.

Felhunter - Increases all resistances by .2 per level.

Grants both the Warlock and the summoned demon an effect as long as that demon is active.

Imp - Reduces threat caused by 8%.

Voidwalker - Reduces physical damage taken by 4%.

Succubus - Increases all damage caused by 4%.

Felhunter - Increases all resistances by .4 per level.

Grants both the Warlock and the summoned demon an effect as long as that demon is active.

Imp - Reduces threat caused by 12%.

Voidwalker - Reduces physical damage taken by 6%.

Succubus - Increases all damage caused by 6%.

Felhunter - Increases all resistances by .6 per level.

Grants both the Warlock and the summoned demon an effect as long as that demon is active.

Imp - Reduces threat caused by 16%.

Voidwalker - Reduces physical damage taken by 8%.

Succubus - Increases all damage caused by 8%.

Felhunter - Increases all resistances by .8 per level.

Grants both the Warlock and the summoned demon an effect as long as that demon is active.

Imp - Reduces threat caused by 20%.

Voidwalker - Reduces physical damage taken by 10%.

Succubus - Increases all damage caused by 10%.

Felhunter - Increases all resistances by 1 per level.

Demonic Sacrifice.name: Demonic Sacrifice
descriptions:
When activated, sacrifices your summoned demon to grant you an effect that lasts 30 minutes.
Each form gains access to unique abilities. You may use only these abilities, Curses, and Demonology spells while transformed.

Soul Link.name: Soul Link
descriptions: When active, 30% of all damage taken by the caster is taken by your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, or Felhunter demon instead.  In addition, both the demon and master will inflict 3% more damage.  Lasts as long as the demon is active.
